Andy Warhol
As the preeminent American artist of the 20th century, Andy Warhol challenged the world to see art differently. Since its founding in 1987, in accordance with Andy Warhol’s will, The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts has established itself among the leading funders of contemporary art in the United States. items.longDescription:
KAWS WINTER

A holiday collection of knitwear from our newly appointed Artist in Residence, KAWS. Keep warm this winter with cashmere, premium wool, and material of ’souffle yarn' sweaters, beanies, gloves and scarves — all adorned with KAWS's signature XX or his iconic COMPANION character. All of the accessories have ’HEATTECH' to make sure you stay warm this season. With a variety of colors to choose from, there’s a style for every member of the family.

Meet our inaugural Artist in Residence, KAWS, a contemporary artist renowned for his distinctive art style that subverts pop culture. KAWS has collaborated with UNIQLO since 2016.

© KAWS
